4-Click on submit button 5- Click on HPR menu to view the pan linked to account details.

Madhya Pradesh Gramin Bank ( A Joint Venture of Govt of India, MP Govt. & Bank of India ) SOP -ADCREQ [ATM/DEBIT CARD GENERATION ] FUNCTION CODE -(R-READYKIT ) 1.Invoke the menu ADCREQ. Select (through dropdown) ‘ R -READYKIT ’ for the mandatory field ‘function’. 2. Enter account numbe r in the mandatory field a/c no.(card name<maximum 19 characters>)
3.select card type (‘N’-rupay debit card) from searcher . 4.Enter Reference number which is already available in stock. 5.Enter first name and last name of customer then click on validate button.

6.click on submit button. FUNCTION CODE -(V-VERIFY ) . 1.select (through dropdown) V -verify for the mandatory field ‘function’ 2.Select (from searcher) or enter account number,which you want to verify,in the mandatory field A /C no. then c lick on validate button.

3.Click on submit button. FUNCTION CODE -(D-DELETE ) . 1.Select (through dropdown) D -DELETE for the mandatory field ‘function’ 2.Enter account number which you want to delete and click on searcher and select account number. 3.Click on submit button.

FUNCTION CODE -(DV-DELETE VERIFY ) . 1.Select (through dropdown) DV -DELETE VERIFY for the mandatory field ‘function’ 2.Select account number from searcher and click on account number. 3.Click on submit button.

FUNCTION CODE I-INQUIRE . 1.Select (through dropdown) I -INQUIRE for the mandatory field ‘function’ 2.Enter account number which you want to inquire and click on searcher and select account number , system will display details . END OF DOCUMENT

Madhya Pradesh Gramin Bank ( A Joint Venture of Govt of India, MP Govt. & Bank of India ) SOP -ATMREV [ATM charge back claim form] D-DATA GENERATION 1.Invoke t he menu ‘ATMREV’. Select function code from drop down D -Data Gener ation. 2.click on go button. 3.Enter tran ID,tran date,reversal amount and remarks. 4.click on submit button.
X-CANCEL 1. Invoke t he menu ‘ATMREV’. Select function code from drop down X -CANCEL. 2.select reference number from searcher. 3.click on go button.
4.click on submit button. V-VERIFY 1.select function code v -verify from dropdown. 2.select reference number from searcher. 3.click on go button.
4.click on submit button. END OF DOCUMENT

Madhya Pradesh Gramin Bank ( A Joint Venture of Govt of India, MP Govt. & Bank of India ) BLIFE [BAJAJ LIFE TRANSACTION VERIFICATION] [NOTE : MENU USED TO VERIFY BAJAJ LIFE TRANSACTION ID GENERATED USING MENU ‘EPAY’ ] 1. INVOKE THE MENU ‘BLIFE’. SELECT FUNCTION CODE AS ‘V -VERIFY’ AND SELECT VALID ‘EPAY ID’ FROM SEARCHER . 2. CLICK ON GO BUTTON THEN SYSTEM WILL N AVIGATE TO NEXT PAGE.
3. VALIDATE ALL DETAILS THEN CLICK ON SUBMIT BUTTON .

Madhya Pradesh Gramin Bank ( A Joint Vent ure of Govt of India, MP Govt. & Bank of India ) MENU - CAACLA - CLOSE LOAN A/C (TERM LOAN) IF COLLATERAL EXIST THEN UNLINK THAT COLLATERAL BY MENU HSCLM 1- INVOKE THE MENU CAACLA  SELECT FUNCTION CODE AS ‘Z- CLOSE’  ENTER A/C ID (TERM LOAN A/C )  CLICK ON GO
2- CLICK ON SUBMIT VERIFY THE RECORD 1. SELECT FUNCTION V -VERIFY . CLICK ON A/C ID SEARCHER AND SELECT REF NO.
2. CLICK ON GO 3. CLICK ON SUBMIT

Madhya Pradesh Gramin Bank ( A Joint Venture of Govt of India, MP Govt. & Bank of India ) CASH TRANSACTION [CASHTR ] FOR FUNCTION CODE “A -ADD” 1. INVOKE THE MENU ‘CASHTR’. SELECT FUNCTION CODE AS “A -ADD” drop down . 2. THEN CLICK on GO button .
3. ENTER “TARGET SOL ID” AND “AMOUNT”. 4. CLICK SUBMIT THEN CLICK ‘OK’ ON POPUP MESSAGE .

FOR FUNCTION CODE “V -VERIFY” 1. INVOKE THE MENU ‘CASHTR’. SELECT FUNCTION CODE AS ‘V -VERIFY’ from drop down AND select REQUEST ID USING SEARCHER.CLICK on GO button . CHECK ALL DETAILS ARE CORRECT AND CLICK SUBMIT. (update screenshot of front page) 2. CLICK ON OK BUTTON OF POPUP MESSAGE. [NOTE: AFTER SUCCESSFUL VERIFICATION SYSTEM WILL CREDIT “CASH001” ACCOUNT AND DEBIT “CASHTR001” ACCOUNT OF THE SOL] FOR FUNCTION CODE “K -ACKNOWLEDGE”
1. INVOKE THE MENU ‘CASHTR’. SELECT FUNCTION CODE AS ‘K -ACKNOWLEDGE’ AND REQUEST ID USING SEARCHER. 2. CLICK ON GO BUTTON . 3. CHECK ALL THE DETAILS ARE CORRECT THEN CLICK ON SUBMIT BUTTON .

4. CLICK OK BUTTON OF POPUP MESSAGE. FOR FUNCTION CODE “Z -ACKNOWLEDGEMENT VERIFY” 1. INVOKE THE MENU ‘CASHTR’. SELECT FUNCTION CODE AS ‘Z -ACKNOWLEDGEMENT VERIFY’ AND REQUEST ID USING SEARCHER. 2. CLICK ON GO BUTTON .

3. CHECK ALL THE DETAILS ARE CORRECT THEN CLICK SUBMIT. [NOTE: AFTER SUCCESSFUL “ACKNOWLEDGEMENT VERIFICATION” SYSTEM WILL CREDIT “CASHTR001” ACCOUNT AND DEBIT “CASH001” ACCOUNT OF THE SOL] END OF THE DOCUMENT

Madhya Pradesh Gramin Bank ( A Joint Venture of Govt of India, MP Govt. & Bank of India ) CIBILERR (CIBIL ERROR REPORT DOWNLOAD ) 1. INVOKE THE MENU ‘CIBILERR’. ENTER ‘SET ID’ AND ‘REPORT DATE ’. 2. CLICK SUBMIT. 3. INVOKE MENU ‘HPR’. 4. CLICK GO.
5. SELECT REPORT AND CLICK PRINT SCREEN TO VIEW.

Madhya Pradesh Gramin Bank ( A Joint Venture of Govt of India, MP Govt. & Bank of India ) COLLATERAL UNLINKING IN FIN10 LATDR ACCOUNT UNLINK COLLATERAL FOR NEW LATDR [ACCOUNT OPEN IN FINACLE 10]. 1. INVO KE THE MENU HLACM. SELECT FUNCTION CODE AS M -MODIFY. ENTER LATDR ACCOUNT NO. IN A/C ID FIELD. CLICK GO. 2. TICK ON “RECORD DEL.” FLAG.
3. CLICK SUBMIT. NOW USER TO VERIFY RECORD. AFTER VERIFICATION SYSTEM WILL UNLINK/DELETE THE COLLATERAL LINKED WITH A/C.
Madhya Pradesh Gramin Bank ( A Joint Venture of Govt of India, MP Govt. & Bank of India ) NEW CORPORATE CIF MAKING PROCESS SELECT CRM SERVER 1- CLICK ON CIF CORPORATE -> NEW ENTITY -> CUSTOMER
2- ENTER THE FIELDS WITH VALID DATA ‘GENERAL -> BASIC INFO’
3- CLICK ON ‘ IDENTIFICATION DOCUMENT ’ TAB THEN CLICK ON ADD IDENTIFICATION DOCUMENT DETAILS IF PAN NO. NOT AVAILABLE THE N ENTER ‘FORM60’ 4- SELECT VALID DOCUMENT TYPE AND CLICK ON SAVE

5- CLICK ON CONTACT TAB -> ADDRESS -> ADD ADDRESS DETAILS 6- FOR ‘CITY / STATE/ COUNTRY /DISTRICT’ ENTER FIRST THREE LETTERS WITH * MARK AND CLICK ON SEARCHER NEW PAGE WILL OPEN ‘AT LOCATION VALUE FIELD ENTER CITY/DISTRICT WITH % SIGN’AND SUBMIT IT. SELECT VALID DATA AND SAVE IT 7- CLICK ON ‘ PHONE AND E -MAIL-> ADD PHONE AND E -MAIL’
8- SELECT PHONE-> TYPE AS MOBILE PHONE 1 THEN SAVE IT *PHONE NO. AS ‘FIRST BOX -> 91, THIRD BOX 10 DIGIT MOBILE NO. ’

9- AGAIN CLICK ON ADD PHONE AND E -MAIL AND SELECT E-MAIL-> TYPE AS COMMUNICATION THEN SAVE IT 10- CLICK ON ‘CORE INTERFACE DETAILS’ ENTER ‘FREE TEXT 5 -> REGULAR’ FREE TEXT 7 -> WALKIN’ FREE TEXT15 (GENDER) -> M-MALE/ F-FEMALE/ O -OTHER’
11- NOW CLICK ON ‘ CURRENCY‘ TAB -> ADD CCY -> SAVE 12- NOW CLICK ON ‘TAX CERTIFICATON DETAILS’ ENTER ‘FOREIGN A/C TAX REPORTING REQUIRED ’ AS ‘N’

“For error shown below use process” ( from point 13 to point 19) For the constitution code 51, Enter Beneficial Owner Details in Relationship Tab,under Relationship type -‘Other Relationship’ Or introducer details 13- Click on ‘relationship tab -> other relationship -> Add relationship
14- Select “cif type, entity type, user field 1 ” as applicable
15- Enter last name of owner then click on searcher, new page will open in that enter CIF id of owner/introducer , than click on submit
16- All the fields get auto fetch, select user field 1 as – beneficial owner , than click on save

17- CLICK ON SUBMIT MESSAGE WILL BE SHOWN AS ‘GENERAL SUBMITTED SUCCESSFULLY’ CLICK ON OK 18- NEW POP UP WILL APPEAR SELECT ‘SELECTED PROCESS NAME AS -> CIF CUSTOMER APPROVAL EDIT - 10.2” THEN CLICK ON ‘SAVE PROCESS SELECTION’

19- POP UP WILL APPEAR AS “PROCESS WAS SAVED SUCCESSFULLY ” 20- IF USER CLICKED ON SAVE OPTION INSTEAD OF SUBMIT THEN THE CIF WILL MOVE TO HIS/HER SELF TRAY IN THIS CONDITION HE/SHE USED TO FOLLOW THE BELOW PATH  CIF CORPORATE -> ENTITY QUEUE -> ‘TRAY TYPE -> SELF’ -> ACTION - > SAVED-> ENTER ENTITY ID (CIF) -> CLICK ON SUBMIT  CORPORATE ENTITY DETAILS WILL APPEAR  RIGHT CLICK ON CIF -> EDIT-> GENERAL DETAILS -> NOW CLICK ON SUBMIT

VERIFICATION OF CIF -> CIF IS IN SUBMIT STATUS 21- VERIFYING USER FOLLOW THE PATH CIF CORPORATE -> ENTITY QUEUE -> ‘TRAY TYPE -> BUSINESS CENTER GROUP’ -> ACTION -> GENERAL BANKING -> ENTER E NTITY ID (CIF) -> CLICK ON GET NOW THE CIF HAS BEEN MOVED TO SELF TRAY OF VERIFYING USER
CLICK ON OK 22- ‘CORPORATE ENTITY DETAILS’ WILL APPEAR
23- CLICK ON CIF ID 24- VISIT ALL PAGES ‘OR’ CHECK ALL DETAILS
THEN CLICK ON ‘ CROSS- X’
25- CLICK ON ‘CURRENT PROCESS STEP’ 26- CKICK ON LINK ‘CORPAPPROVE: -PROCESS TIME ’ 27- NEW PAGE WILL APPEAR AS ‘APPROVAL FORM’ SELECT DECESION AS ‘APPROVE’
CLICK ON SAVE APPROVAL FORM 28- NOW THE CIF IS VERIFIED SUCCESSFULLY  NOW LINK THE CIF TO CORE SERVER BY MENU “HCCFM”

DELETION  If user want to cancel the modify cif or new cif which is in ‘saved status’ “ENTITY QUEUE -> SELF TRAY “SELF” -> ACTION “SAVED” -> ENTITY ID (ENTER CIF ID) -> SUBMIT -> CLICK ON CHECK BOX -> RIGHT CLICK ON CIF -> ENTITY -> SELECT DELETE ”

Madhya Pradesh Gramin Bank ( A Joint Venture of Govt of India, MP Govt. & Bank of India ) DCBBR [Consolidate Daily Cash Book] 1. Invoke the menu-DCBBR 2. Addition of DCBBR, Select the Fu nction A-ADD then click on GO button.
3. Enter the appropriate denomination of each fields. 4. Enter Received today and Last Paid Today amount by generati ng report from HSCWR PTA 6. Enter correct value in Received Today and Paid Today
7. Click on Submit button 8. Select function V-Verify to Verify the DCBBR .
Madhya Pradesh Gramin Bank ( A Joint Venture of Govt of India, MP Govt. & Bank of India ) DCSER ADD  Invoke the menu –DCSER
 SELECT Function code : -A-ADD  Enter the value in ‘Customer id’ and ‘Account number’
 Select ‘option code’  Click on ‘Fetch’ Than searcher available in ‘card number’
 Select ‘Card Number’ from searcher  Select card number than click “Go’
 Select ‘Card status’ and ‘Remarks’
 Click on submit
Verify  Invoke the menu and select function V-Verify
 Enter the ‘cust id’ and ‘Account number’ and select ‘option code’ and click on ‘Fetch’  Select card no from searcher
 Click GO  Click on Submit
C-Cancel
 Invoke the menu Select Function code C -Cancel  Enter the ‘Cust id’ , ‘Account Number’ and select ‘option code ‘  Click on ‘Fetch’
 Select Card number from searcher  Click on ‘Go’
 Click on ‘Submit’

Madhya Pradesh Gramin Bank ( A Joint Venture of Govt of India, MP Govt. & Bank of India ) MENU - ETDSUPD & CHLDTL * ETDSUPD - TO GENERATE SEQUENCE NO . 1- INVOKE THE MENU - ETDSUPD 2- SELECT TDS TYPE - FINACLE  OPTION CODE - GENERATE (FOR GENERATION OF SEQUENCE NO.)  OPTION CODE - DELET E (FOR DELETION OF SEQUENCE NO. BEFORE ‘CHLDTL’ MENU)
3- CLICK ON SUBMIT 4- VISIT ‘HPR’ MENU FOR PRINT ING OF THE RECORDS
CHLDTL - TO TRANSFER TDS AMOUNT TO HO 1- SELECT FUNCTION A -ADD FUNCTION 2- CLICK ON GO
3- ENTER ‘FROM DATE AND TO DATE’ ( FROM DATE ‘START DATE OF PREVIOUS MONTH’ AND END DATE ‘LAST DATE OF PREVIOS MONTH’ ) 4- CLICK ON ‘SEQ NUMBER’ SEARCHER

5- SELECT ‘NATURE OF PAYMENT - 94A’ AND ‘TYPE OF PAYMENT’ -TDS/TCS PAYABLE BY TAX PAYER ’ ENTER ‘TDS AMOUNT’ (TDS AMOUNT EQUAL TO ETDSUPD REPORT AMOUNT) ASSESSMENT YEAR SHOULD BE NEXT FINANCIAL YEAR IN THE FORMAT ‘YYYY -YY’ 6- CLICK ON SUBMIT
NOW ‘VERIFY / MODIFY /INQUIRE ’ THE RECORD 7- SELECT FUNCTION ‘V -VERIFY / MODIFY / INQUIRE ’ CLICK ON SEARCHER OF ‘REF NUMBER’ 8- SELECT ‘REFERENCE NUMBER’ 9- CLICK ON GO
10- CLICK ON SUBMIT

Madhya Pradesh Gramin Bank ( A Joint Venture of Govt of India, MP Govt. & Bank of India ) FILETR AND HTTUM SOP 1- GENERATE THE ‘TXT’ FILE BY THE BULK UTILITY ( THE DATE FORMAT OF UTILITY AND SYSTEM SHOULD BE SAME AS ‘DD-MM -YYYY ’) 2- INVOKE THE MENU - FILETR
3- CLICK ON BROWSE.. 4- GO TO FINACLEUPLOAD, SELECT THE FILE WHICH IS TO BE TRANSFER
5- CLICK ON UPLOAD

HTTUM 1- INVOKE THE MENU - HTTUM  ENTER ‘REPORT TO ’ FIELD – BM  SELECT TRANSACTION SUBTYPE – BANK INDUCED/CUSTOMER INDUCED  ACTION - FIRST USE ‘TRIAL’ MODE SO THAT IF ANY ERROR IS PRESENT WE CAN IDENTIFY IT AND CORRECT IT IF TRIAL MODE DOES NOT HAVE ANY ERROR THAN USE ‘ACTION - ENTER / POST’  SELECT ‘RENAME FILE AFTER UPLOAD’ - NEVER  SELECT ‘FILE LOCATION - USER APPLICATION FILE PATH’  ENTER ‘UPLOAD FILE NAME - (NAME OF THE FILE WHICH IS TRANSFERRED BY MENU FILETR) WITH .TXT EXTENSION ’  CLICK ON SUBMIT TRIAL MODE ENTER / POST
 AFTER SUCCESSFUL UPLOAD SYSTEM SHOW MESSAGE AS “BATCH PROGRAM SUCCESSFULLY INVOKED” 2- CHECK THE ‘HPR’ MENU FOR SUCCESS/FAILURE STATUS OF THE TRANSACTION

3- NOTE THE TRANSACTION NUMBER 4- INVOKE THE MENU ‘HTM’  IF FILE IS UPLOADED AT ‘POST’ FUNCTION THEN SELECT FUNCTION V -VERIFY  IF FILE IS UPLOADED AT ‘ENTER’ FUNTION THEN SELECT FUNCTION M -MODIFY  ENTER THE TRANSACTION NO. IN ‘TRANSACTION ID’ FIELD  CLICK ON EXPAND  FIRST SELECT DEBIT A/C ID SRL NO. IN ‘PART TRANSACTION SRL. NO. FROM and TO ’ FIELD ( IF DEBIT TRANSACTION ARE MORE THAN FOLLOW PROCESS OF POINT NO. 5)

 IF TRANSACTION A/C ID IS ‘OFFICE ACCOUNT’ THEN ENTER ‘1’ IN REF. NO. FIELD (BOTH CREDIT AND DEBIT OFFICE A/C )  CLICK ON ‘PART BY POST TRANSACTION’  CLICK ON ‘SELECT ALL PART TRANSACTIONS’  CLICK ON SUBMIT
 SELECT ‘OVERRIDE EXCEPTIONS’  CLICK ON ACCEPT  DEBIT TRANSACTION GET POSTED

5- NOW ENTER CREDI T ACCOUNT SRL NO. RANGE IN ‘PART TRANSACTION SRL NO. FROM AND PART TRANSACTION SRL. NO.TO’ ( EG. THE TRANSACTION ID IS HAVING 300 RECORDS THEN FIRST TAKE ‘1 – 50’ RANGE, AFTER IT TAKE ‘51 -100’ RANGE, THEN 101 - 150, AND GO ON TILL LAST TRANSACTION ) 6- CLICK ON GO
7- CLICK ON ‘POST BY PART TRANSACTION’ 8- CLICK ON ‘SELECT ALL PART TRANSACTION’

9- SELECT ‘OVER RIDE EXCEPTIONS’ AS YES  CHECK ALL PAGES AND SELECT ALL ACCOUNT  NOTE - USER SHOULD NOT CLICK ON PROXY POST IF THEY SELECT THEN THAT TRANSACTION GOES AT PROXY LEVEL AT THAT A/C ID 10- CLICK ON ACCEPT 11- NOW FOLLOW THIS PATH FOR ANOTHER RANGE OF ACCOUNT ’S TILL THE LAST TRANSACTION
Madhya Pradesh Gramin Bank ( A Join t Venture of Govt of India, MP Govt. & Bank of India ) SOP FOR REMOVAL FOR DNS 1. Select window+R , type “cmd ” 2. Enter command “ ncpa.cpl “
3. This will navigate to network connection 4. Double click on Ethernet
5. Click on properties , a dialog box will appear for admin user id password , PLEASE CONTACT YOUR REGIONAL OFFICE -IT , FOR USER ID AND PASSWORD
6. Double click on internet protocol version 4 (Tcp/IPv4 )
7. Select “obtain DNS server address automatically “ to remove DNS
8. On selecting obtain DNS server address automatically , click ok 9. Open control panel , go to Internet Option
10. Got to tab advanced >>scroll and come down and make sure “use TLS 1.0 , use TL S 1.1, use TLS 1.2, use TLS 1.3, fileds are checked , click ok 11. Restart the system

chunks.text: Madhya Pradesh Gramin Bank ( A Joint Venture of Govt of India, MP Govt. & Bank of India ) HMCLZ OH FOR SUSPEND RELEASE AND REGULARIZE 2.1 Maintain Outward Clearing Zone – Suspend (HMCLZOH)  On invocation of the menu “HMCLZOH”, select ‘ S – Suspend Zone’ from the drop down, enter or select (through searcher) an existing Zone Date/ Code (which is to be suspended; suspension is must after lodgement and verification of instruments and before releasing the zone to Shadow Balance status).  Click on GO.  System will navigate the user to a General Details page, wherein, the details entered / selected during the opening of this zone will be displayed.  Go to the ‘Statistics’ page, system to display the number of instruments entered along with its values and the instrument verified against the instruments entered.  Click on the button “SUBMIT”.  System to generate the message – “Zone - <> <> Suspended successfully”; on successful suspension of an Outward Clearing Zone.

chunks.pdf: HMCLZOH FOR SUSPEND RELEASE AND REGULARIZE.pdf
chunks.text: 2.2 Maintain Outward Clearing Zone – Release to Shadow (HMCLZOH)  On invocation of the menu “HMCLZOH”, select ‘R – Release to Shadow Balance’ from the drop down, enter or select (through searcher) an existing Zone Date/ Code (the instruments entered under the selected zone are all verified and the Zone is already suspended).  Click on GO.  System will navigate the user to a General Deta ils page, wherein, the field Zone Status will be displayed as ‘SUSPENDED ZONE’.  Go to the ‘Statistics’ page, system to display the number of instruments entered along with its values and the instrument verified against the instruments entered (by now all instruments should be verified). Click on the button “SUBMIT”.  System to generate the message – “Job initiated. Check print queue after sometime” on releasing the zone to shadow balance successfully. User should access the menu ‘HPR’ and view the report o n “OUTWARD CLEARING RELEASE TO SHADOW BALANCE REPORT”.

chunks.pdf: HMCLZOH FOR SUSPEND RELEASE AND REGULARIZE.pdf
chunks.text: 2.3 Maintain Outward Clearing Zone – Regularize a Zone (HMCLZOH)  On invocation of the menu “HMCLZOH”, select ‘G – Regularize Shadow Balance’ from the drop down, enter or select (through searcher) an existing Zone Date/ Code (once this function is executed successfully, the zone will get closed).  Click on GO.  System will navigate the user to a General Details page, wherein, the field Zone Stat us will be displayed as ‘RELEASED TO SHADOW BAL’.  Go to the ‘Statistics’ page, system to display the number of instruments entered along with its values and the instrument verified against the instruments entered (by now all instruments should be verified ). Click on the button “SUBMIT”.  System to generate the message – “Job initiated. Check print queue after sometime”. on regularizing a zone with shadow balance successfully. User should access the menu ‘HPR’ and view the report on “OUTWARD CLEARING REGULA RIZATION OF SHADOW BALANCE REPORT”
